case.state: Alright! Yae is here!
Hello! My name is Yae. I hope we can all have fun!
Yae is ready to go!
While I don't mind sharing my name, I'm just hoping nobody gets confused.
I'll just warn you now that you shouldn't be too surprised when I win!
Hm, losing wouldn't be so bad, but I think it'd be more fun to win.
It's almost too exciting! Let's get started!
Best to take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for now.
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~ for me, please.
I'll have ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, okay?
Well, look at me go!
This sort of takes the suspense out of things.
Come one! Let's see what you have!
Any ninja worth her salt makes her own luck, don't you know!
Let's see if you've got what it takes to beat me.
I had a feeling that would work out well for me.
I'd be surprised if you could best me this time around.
Comfortably in control, as always!
Guess my charm is starting to kick in, huh?
I had to get lucky one of these times!
Man, where was this hand when I lost my pants?
I knew I wasn't out of this yet!
Don't you worry! I'm still ready to go!
Hey, maybe I'm back on the up and up!
I hope this isn't too little too late.
Whew, I was worried there for a second...
I'm counting on Edo not to get invaded by aliens while I'm gone...
There's not a tea house around here, is there?
Let's see what you've got.
I was kind of hoping for a little better.
I've cheated at my fair share of games of chance while doing my work, but I promise it's nothing but fair play from me right now!
Hm, this could work, right?
Where's the fun in knowing the outcome each time, right?
Eh, good enough.
I could probably be paying a little more attention if I really want to win...
If I sounded the call here... I wonder if Impact would show up.
Well, worse case scenario I blast my way out of here... but I doubt that'll happen.
I'm not sitting on gold here, but it's not nothing.
Maybe I should have brought a lucky cat along with me...
Good, but is it going to be good enough?
Alright, I'm not out of the running yet!
Gotta put up a good fight, at the very least!
What's the point of being afraid? Let's go!
Come on! Let's see what you're made of!
Feels like I can't count on pure luck to pull me through.
I guess I need to start thinking about what happens when I lose.
I like that eager look in your eye. Let's not waste any more time!
The only thing I'm trying to do at this point is catch a break...
Alright, I've got it this time!
It has been a while since I've been on the back foot with nobody to bail me out. Being tied up by you guys could be fun though...
Okay... just play it cool...
If I lose this one... that's on me.
So much for putting up a good fight...
I... I messed that up, didn't I?
Even if things get rough, you won't catch me sneaking out.
I'd be surprised if anyone messed up worse than I did.
Nope, that didn't exactly pan out...
Maybe... I can get a do-over?
I'd know if someone was cheating... which is to say I'm doing this bad all on my own.
Oh, no! I'm not ready to give up yet!
Not exactly the boost I was hoping for...
If I'm not taking risks at this point, there's no way things are going to improve.
It's just bad luck, right? It's nothing personal?
I can do better than this! I know I can!
Let's just move on. Having to show these cards is more embarrassing than being naked.
It's frustrating, but I'm not about to start throwing cards through people...
Nothing sexier than that much confidence!
... She can't be this cute and not know it, right?
... There's fried tofu?
Before I answer... is there a certain type that you might consider more... delicious than others?
Quick change? Even a novice can pull that off! You'd be amazed what someone with my experience can do with it!
I'm not against it at all. Especially the part where I show off.

Typically I'm just trying to get in and get out. Some places it's easier to sneak in, others it's easier to be let in through the front door, but no matter what you've got to get out without leaving a trace.
Of course! The emperor is kind and cares deeply for his people. He is a little... relaxed, but as his loyal servants we make sure to keep his peace!
I was trained from a very young age to serve Edo. Girls who show promise are selected to be trained at the academy for kunoichi. That's all I can really say. State secrets, you know?

Not that I've thought much about it, but I always imaged having a picnic with sweets under a cherry blossom tree, then we see a performance at the theater, and end it all with dinner and drinks at the inn!
How about a submarine full of soup? I literally had to swim through passages flooded with broth and avoid piece of nori the size of a raft!
It's kind of hard to pick. Cities in the sky, a village on the back of a giant turtle, maybe the land of the dead and ghosts.
Do battles between giant robots count? I feel like I've been in so many at this point I might be desensitized.
Oh! I want to touch it! It's so fluffy I can't help but want to!
Pampering? Ah, what I wouldn't give for a massage and a strong drink. Then I could just kick back, super relaxed...
Ah, there's nothing to make a girl feel pampered like a spa day. Facial, massage, a hot bath, and a five-star meal. That's the ticket.
... Does a bazooka count as a convenience?
Edo Castle has come under attack by machines so many times, I'm not sure I'm really keen on "modern conveniences."
Being able to manipulate metal like that... breaking out of chains and jail cells would be a snap...
How do you do that? If I could do that, I could get clapped in irons and thrown in a cell only to let myself out at my own leisure...
W-whoa! Yumeko! Th-things were intense enough already!
Knowing what I know about you, Yumeko, I'm genuinely afraid of what you might come up with to up the ante...
Oh, no, no, no, no. I don't want to be rude, but you and fire sound like a bad combination.
Okay, firebug, let's try and finish this game before we decide to do anything crazy...
Oh... this might be a little rough for you...
I've had to camp out in the cold before! I usually don't sleep too much though. Not because of the cold, but because I'm trying to do surveillance.
I'm no stranger to packing the necessities, but as a ninja I'm trained to travel as light as possible. I've got to be able to survive on next to nothing, after all.
Oh, try not to light fires when I'm out camping. It could attract the attention of the people I'm following...
Ah, I do miss visiting all the tea houses and bath houses all around Japan. It would be nice to travel around without having to fight enemies at and in between each stop.
I wish I had more time to cook for myself. I've been practicing when I can, but I still end up eating at the tea house most days.
Me? I think I'm looking for someone adventurous. My life's been a bit slow in the romance department, so I want to make up for lost time.
I haven't been looking at your head and face much recently, so it all seems the same to me.
I thought it sounded fun. I've been missing fun recently, especially the sort of fun that involves getting my clothes off.
This place does raise a lot of questions. I tried snooping around for answers, but all I found were more questions...
Ooh! Ooh! I have a joke! I tell it to people to make them lower their guard! Okay, what does a panda say to scare people? ... Bamboo!
Oh, trying to figure out our personalities? Well, I've got Type A blood, so take that as you will.
That sounds grrrreat... but it sounds more like a second or third date activity, Moskii. Not on the first meeting...
I'm not sure. These concepts are foreign, so I'm not sure where all the names come from exactly, aside from the obvious ones.
No reason to go too fast have the game go too fast. I think the anticipation makes things more exciting...
I would have never pulled a prank on my sensei. It wouldn't matter how well I vanished, they would have found me and the punishment would have been... severe.
Hmm... that does sound like a better reward than not cumming...
Vegetable juice? Can't say I've ever tried it, but I think I'll just stick with tea...
Can't say I've had vegetable juice. Besides, sake sounds better right about now.
I don't think I have had vegetable juice. Any alcohol in it because a bit of alcohol sounds good right about now.
Disguising yourself as someone else can be fun, just as long as you're flexible.
Well, I'm not stranger to balancing multiple costumes and identities myself.
I'm flattered if you like me from this angle, but don't get too used to it. I like to look my lovers in the eye...
Stare if you want, but I can't imagine it'll get us anywhere; however, it is the perfect thing to grab onto and pull me closer...

Words often fail in the heat of the moment. Give a girl a squeeze down here to let her know she's doing a good job. That will entice her to do better, and you'll squeeze harder, and on and on you'll go...
Very practical, actually! This chain mail is designed to be light and quiet and keep me from getting all cut up in a fight!
Oh, the rumors are well founded. After all, nothing loosens lips like the possibility of sex.
Of course! I'm not really keeping it a secret here, Bobobo.
How? I really couldn't tell you...
For that to happen, you would need to find a master who can teach you to be a ninja! It isn't easy though, Bobobo. Are you really sure you want to do that?
Hey! I wouldn't cheat like that! At least, not when I'm just playing for fun!
Exactly how sure of that are you?
There might be, but I wouldn't really recommend it. It's better just to wear quiet clothes.
Really? Does that mean there are a lot of ninja where you come from?
Well, I would rather win, but I'm not worried about losing, Sofia. You don't need to worry about me.
Well, if being a ninja isn't interesting enough for you, maybe you'd like to hear about my mermaid powers. I doubt you've ever met a mermaid before.
Well, not as much as I'd like. I probably have just as much as anyone else here.
Sneak in? Sneak in where exactly, Sofia?
I think the only one of us who is nervous about seeing more of me is you, Sofia...
If it's Edo you want to know about, I'm something of an expert. After all, I just call it "home!"
Oh, really? Do you think you would prefer I was wearing black?
You presume too much, milord. If I meant to do you harm, we wouldn't be standing here exchanging words so casually...
Is that what foreigners like? I guess I don't really have a habit of showing myself to them, but it seems they preferred chasing the geisha around to anything else.
Oh, yes! I've got a very special, super secret agenda here!
Well, kunoichi are trained a little differently from the male ninja. The emphasis is less on combat and more on espionage and subterfuge. Since we're women, people are quick to underestimate us.
I wouldn't count yourself out so quickly, Jura. A good kunoichi could disguise herself as a man if needed. It might be uncomfortable, but even you could do it.
Ghosts are no problem. When ghosts threaten Edo, I send them back to the underworld in two pieces.
... If that's some sort of joke, I'm afraid I don't get it.
Hey, what's with the attitude? I don't remember being so rude to you!
Actually, I wouldn't be all that surprised. I've run into more ghosts than I can count.
I don't see why you couldn't? It's really not the kind of thing I see ghosts wearing.
I stay hidden when I'm working, but I'm not here for work.
It has been awfully quiet recently. Nothing but thwarting kidnappings and punishing perverts, really.
Of course I wouldn't want that to happen... but have you seen some of the people who are already here? There's enough potential for peril even without me...
It's funny, I was thinking something similar. There is nothing wrong with some of the guys here, but I feel just as interested in some of he women.
Well, I don't usually have much time for cutting loose. I have to make the most of the opportunity.
Usually I'm behind the scenes, but some problems require a much less subtle approach.
While I appreciate the vote of confidence, things always turn out much better for me when we team up and work together!
Not as much of one as I'd like. It has been quieter recently, so quiet that I can actually have a hobby!
No, it was a senior kunoichi who taught me, a woman. It would've been awfully scandalous to have a male teacher for any part of the training.
And shouldn't you know better than to underestimate someone just because they seem to be on the back foot?
I don't know if it's quite as dramatic as that. Most of the time we're just watching, gathering information. The idea is to avoid confrontation when we can.
Is that so? I've been trained in the same techniques myself. Most of my assignments call for keeping hidden though, so I stick to these sort of clothes usually.
Well, always nice to meet a colleague. My training was very well-rounded, so I received that sort of training myself. Normally I stick to the shadows though, so I keep dressed for that most days.
Well, I'm comfortable relying on them, but I just wish they took things a bit more seriously.
It's not like they're incompetent, it's just that sometimes they don't focus as much as they should.
That is a good point. I guess I'm not in Edo anymore. I'm a guest in this place myself...
Usually we don't, but some of the incidents I've been involved in have been so public that getting recognized for helping out was inevitable.
Maybe I do, but I'm sure it's not fair to them to go comparing them to me.
I don't see why not, Kaz. I figure anyone could practice it enough to make it easy.
Roll, you don't need to nervous. I know exactly what you're thinking, and I want you to just come right out and ask it.
Me? Just a kunoichi at the top of her game and fairly average girl, I think. Any secrets I have belong to other people, Yumeko.
I don't think I'm a hard read, Yumeko. I'm not much different than most people, aside from my work as a kunoichi. I've got secrets, sure, but none of them are mine.
You mean Yae Impact? I think she's got a pretty cool design! She looks like me but with a mermaid tail!
That sounds rough, Jura. I just get the clothes for my disguises at the shops. I also know enough about sewing that I can make my own alterations...
Normally when we need to fight, we use Impact to fight. He's a bit eccentric, but his power is incredible. He can level a whole building with even a light punch.
You must be pretty skilled if you can move around stealthily even while wearing that bell of yours.
The outfit isn't anything special, Nonon. I just use quick change to switch out my clothes completely, see?
Yes... and you are a ninja?
One loss is nothing to worry over. I'll bounce back soon enough.
It's true that some ninjas don't answer to a master, but others just do whatever they like. Some of them are selfish and evil, but others don't want to be stuck serving a corrupt master.

It's not easy bracing yourself against the rafters for hours just to listen in on a conversation. I wouldn't expect it to be for everyone! Not every mission can be storming the castle or sneaking around in disguise.
I don't usually have a whole lot of free time, but lately I've been trying my hand at baking. I've always wanted to make my own sweets.
Please. I would hardly consider two losses a setback. Besides, you won't see me worried no matter how many times I lose.
I don't think you should celebrate so soon. Your good luck has you balanced on a thin wire between victory and defeat.
Don't act so proud of yourself! You're lucky this isn't a real fight where I could go all out!
I'm trained to keep cool under pressure. A friendly little game of strip poker isn't going to rattle me.
Oh, but I'm out in the open now, Kaz, and I'm planning on making the most of it.
You want to know if I've got any interesting tricks, is that it?
It would be better if you weren't here being a nuisance.
The last thing you want is big, bulky armor weighing you down when you're trying to slip past your enemies.
Light and flexible is the best for my line of work. Heavy armor is really just for people who expect to get hit.
We are pretty closed off. People who are different are treated with suspicion. All the people here are much more open to certain ideas...
Edo is just concerned with Edo and ruling the rest of Japan. We're very traditional, but personally I'm a little more open to new ideas. Ideas that aren't so outrageous here...
You might have a hard time seeing the sights, since you'd stick out so much. You might need someone who can tour you around discreetly, show you some more private sights.
You? In Edo? You're liable to get mobbed by curious citizens. Better to go with someone who can move you around surreptitiously and knows all the nice, quiet places.
A pleasant surprise compared to how I usually surprise people, I'm sure.
If being attractive was enough then neither of us would be here, yet here we are. I'd wager there's just a little something extra that brings you here.
You really think you've got it figured out, huh?
There's no need to be suspicious, Leon. Not of me. I promise.
Come on now, Leon, you can give me a little more credit than that. I work for the emperor of Edo, tasked with protecting the people from threats unseen.
I'm just looking for a bit of respite from the usual chaos. A girl doesn't get many chances to indulge herself when the castle is being invaded.
Normally I don't do requests, but I'm almost certain you're going to get exactly what you want.
Careful, Sheena. You might be heading for a sudden fall.
I'm not always on my own. I've got my friends to back me up in the field sometimes too!
My clothes? No, not at all. They're basically work clothes.
I came fully prepared to lose. Fully prepared to win as well, but losing would have its own perks.
It might not surprise you to learn pretty much all kunoichi are beautiful. Something about a pretty face just makes people want to share their secrets.
I agree that there's still more we can learn from one another, but I wouldn't say our time is up quite yet.
Even if I'm down and out, that doesn't mean there's nothing left we can learn from one another.
The limelight isn't for everyone, Jura. Espionage is not the time and place to be garnering a lot of attention.
I do have my moments for shock and awe, but for most of what I do it's important to be covert. It's important to know when to stand out and when to stay hidden.
You're playing a dangerous game, Leon. Letting yourself be so easily beguiled by a ninja is liable to leave you tied up in a hole somewhere.
Hehe! Maybe? Seems you're more than willing to take the risk of getting entirely duped by me.
No hiding to~background.time~. I've been prepared to go all the way if it comes to that.
I can't guarantee I won't disappear like that, Kaz, but I promise I'll at least give some warning before I do.
Nothing is lighter and more breathable than a ninja's attire. It offers enough protection to shield you from a sword's slash while being comfortable enough to hang upside down in.
Naps? When and if I sleep, I do it at night. I have, you know, missions and jobs. I can't just lay about like some kind of freelancer.
I... don't do a lot of napping. I know Goemon and Ebisumaru slack off a lot, but I have actual assignments to get done. I just sleep at night... usually.
I'm still just a person, Pandy. I'm not invisible or anything! If I want to be seen, then I can be seen!
Sometimes being seen has its advantages. Especially when you're trying to meet new, interesting people.
Any competent ninja wouldn't be found even if you were looking for them. Then again, they wouldn't bother following you unless there was a good reason for it.
Well, if these ninja are good enough evade detection, they would have to be good. The real question is why would they be following you...
As a ninja, being seen as a vulnerable woman and a sexual prospect is a perception I try to foster. It's easy to fool people who are underestimating you, lusting after you, or both.
Unfortunately, there are none. Believe me, I've probably seen every last ninja, wannabe ninja, and everything in between from every corner of Japan.
Twice in a row? I'm not getting psyched out, am I?
Again? That's... frustrating!
I'm not perfect, but I'm usually not so careless that I'd mess up twice in a row...
But I just took a turn! Shouldn't it be someone else this time?
H-hey! What's going on? Is my luck really just that bad?
Losing over and over really isn't all that fun...
Something weird is going on! Why is it just me?!
Even if it is just luck, I never thought I'd do this badly...
I can't win them all! Well, maybe I could, but what fun would that be?
Another loss isn't going to take the fight out of me, I promise!
You don't give up, do you? Too bad because I won't give up either!
Wow, this is gonna be a close game, isn't it?
I'm afraid you'll have to do just a little better than that before you get to see the goods, but I suppose you're one step closer.
You've held on this long. I guess you do deserve a little reward from me.
It'll take more than this to keep me down. Just try me and see!
Me again? Hm, maybe I should be flattered? Then again, maybe not.
No point in sweating it. I've gotten out of tougher situations before.
Right, right, I know the drill by now. I guess coming from behind will have to wait until later.
A kunoichi has to be ready to show a little skin to secure victory. I know this is more than "a little," but that just illustrates how good of a kunoichi I am.
Okay, so maybe I'm not going to win. At this point, I don't see why that would be so bad.
That's too bad, but I'll just have to step up my game!
I can't let myself fall behind! I know I can do better than this!
I'm not used to being the one who's the butt of the joke. I think it's sort of throwing me off...
Alright, I'm getting backed into the corner now. If there was a time for a reversal, it's now. I just have to make it happen, right?
Well, fair is fair. Losing like this is so embarrassing though...
I guess this is due to poor luck and a lack of preparation. Still, I shouldn't give up quite yet.
Unfortunately, Nagatoro, I can't exactly let you in on the details. I can say that it would be a big help if you could lose a bit more of your clothes for us.
Unfortunately, Nagatoro, I can't exactly let you in on the details. You have, however, been a big help in the success of the mission so far.
You would love that, wouldn't you? I'm not about to give you that satisfaction...
You say that, but are you confident enough to put your money where your mouth is?
Really.
Can you blame me? I try not to ask questions I'm not prepared to learn the answer to.
In my experience, they keep the aspiring kunoichi and shinobi separated. You'd probably just be surrounded by other guys!
If I win at this point, it will have come at the cost of my pants coming off.
Bobo... bo...
Oil, sweat, and other fluids make your skin tacky and stick a bit. It's better to wear padded clothes that muffle sound.
I see! Well, even if they are ninjas, I promise that none of them are quite like me.
But I'm telling you, Sofia, that whatever I end up showing you is what I want you to see!
See? Not so boring now, am I? Maybe you'd like to see me transform?
I didn't mean to make it sound like I didn't have any sort of clue! If you've got a question, you should ask it!
Sofia, I didn't think you'd be so forward! But if you want me to touch you like that...
I wish I could get a read on you, Sofia. It doesn't seem like you're trying to be distant, but... I just don't know.
It's because I work so hard that there is no unrest. You have to nip these problems in the bud.
But I can't just sit around when there's trouble! It's easy enough to handle with a little help from the guys!
C'mon, Maria! You can't think of just one thing you would absolutely need help from a guy for?
Yeah! I've had time to bake treats that I can bring along on my missions and I've also been sneaking around looking at paintings as well!
They never really encouraged that. Always went on and on about how men and women are different. They like to be treated differently, spoken to differently... touched differently...
Yes... well, I think you're getting ahead of yourself. I'm not there... yet...
I appreciate the vote of confidence, but maybe you should think of your wife before inviting that sort of trouble.
I'm glad to hear it, Of course, if you stick around long enough you might find you like me even better without it.

If you're not careful, Revy, you could find yourself in a compromising position chasing after that sort of thing. It's always right when you believe you have the upper hand that a ninja springs their trap.

The subtle approach is always preferred, especially when you're outnumbered and underestimated. All it takes for a mission's success is getting the right agent with the right skills into the right spot at the right time.
Well, if it would be exciting for you, I could pretend to be a man.
Then maybe you'd prefer it if I pretended to be the man? I can be flexible...
There's plenty of reasons, but it wouldn't be very polite to brag about myself too much. I'm sure the ninja of Doma are a perfectly capable organization with many skilled agents.
Kaz, having the clothes isn't even half the problem. You need to be quick, resourceful, and it takes a pretty elaborate bit of sleight of hand.
I wouldn't be here if I wasn't ready to be very open with everyone here. I think it's vital we give voice to those burning questions we have inside of us.

As kunoichi, there is high expectation that we will have to use our sexuality to distract and deter. We were taught how to talk and act to get someone to lower their guard. Ways to subtly show skin and brush up against someone to get them to think about more than that. We were also given very hands on lessons to develop a certain skill.
Well, you outnumber the men onboard your ship, right? That probably motivates them to behave themselves.
Can't say I'm surprised. Men vastly outnumbered by women day in and day out. They're probably on their best behavior.
So you really don't know? Edo is the capital of Japan, of course. There's nowhere more important in the whole country.
And I'm from Edo's Secret Special Investigations Ninjas.
Yes, we manage just fine. I wouldn't even call this a setback.
And what about you? What master do you serve? Or are you an independent agent yourself?
Oh? Is that so? If you want to try on costumes, you can just do that without having official business.
Oh? A private lesson from you? I would take you up on that in a heartbeat.
I wouldn't dream of just giving up entirely. Besides, it would be no good to bow out before I put you in your place.
Is that so? Not normally a very lucky person, huh? How unlucky are we talking? Ever fallen into a pit trap you dug yourself?
Think that all you like, but it's no problem a few blasts from my bazooka wouldn't take care of.
I'm not just trained for battle, Roll. Sometimes espionage requires you to get a little intimate with your target...
Kaz, are you so sure you haven't already been beguiled?
That does sound impressive, but I don't waste my energy on flashy tricks; however, I do have this one trick where I turn into a mermaid.
Don't kid yourself. Maybe it's you who's jealous of me. Maybe you'd like a piece of me for yourself...
I'm allowed to have a secret here or there, aren't I? Even a few that aren't state secrets...
Obviously I'm entrusted with all sorts of secrets, but I get the feeling you're more interested in the sort I keep for my own sake...
Impact always makes his mind known! We'd rely on him a whole lot more if he wasn't always so busy making movies.
I just wish Impact was a bit more reliable. I understand being a movie star is demanding, but he could be a bit more accommodating to help when Edo is in trouble!
Hey, it wasn't my idea! That's just how the Wise Old Man designed it!
Well, it's not entirely vanity. It was just how the Wise Old Man who decided on the design, after all!
Well, you never know what sort of disguise you're going to need. I've got all sorts of servants outfits, foreign dresses, and even some interesting outfits they use in brothels.
And it doesn't bother you when people aren't paying attention to you?
Oh, I'm deadly serious when I'm on the job, but I'm not here in any sort of official capacity. I'm just here for me.
I'm sorry, ~adrien~, but I really am disarmed and helpless. My only chance might be to take your weapon off of you.
Well, you can't be all that guarded if you're so blatantly revealing a weakness I can exploit. Or maybe you're hoping that I do exploit that weakness?
Oh, I could go on about thwarting coups from ghosts and space aliens, but would that really be the best use of our time?
Oh, for sure. And more than once I found myself without it and just had to hold out for rescue.
You don't make it very hard...
I don't see why not. The quick change is something even the most novice of ninja can perform.
When you're a group of professionals, you can make it work!
Every once and a while, but my work clothes are pretty comfy. Nicer clothes are always so delicate and hard to move around in. I like to get dressed up, but I really need a good reason.
But you're still warming up to the idea of having to pleasure yourself in front of your new friends, right?
Well, I didn't train all those years for nothing. Most of the time, I'm in and out without a single trace of my ever having been there.
Hm, usually it's just a "thank you" from the emperor and then a round of tea and dumplings back at Omitsu's shop.
Of course, the best fight is the one you don't have. If you're quick and quiet enough, you're out of there without ever once having to draw your sword.
Nearly everyone bathes in public bath houses in Edo. Mutual nudity is a part of life. The women all bathing together is seen as strictly platonic, but there's no reason it has to be...
Nudity isn't all that taboo as long as its a private setting. It's even though to strengthen bonds of friendship between women, but they never give much thought to other sorts of bonds...
Ah, of course. I should have known keeping you all to myself would be pretty much impossible.
Well, it makes sense you'd flourish under all the attention. Too bad it wouldn't be just the two of us.
You don't need to worry about that. I wouldn't have come this far if things weren't up to my standards...
Well... I imagine I'd at least go as far as... a room with a view.
Oh? And just where are you hoping we'll reappear?
Well, next time you have a chance you can try hanging by your thighs from a man's shoulders.You wouldn't even need clothes...
I'm not here to practice; I'm just here for some good, clean fun...
Even I can't be on all the time. I'm still a woman after all. I've got needs and times I get lonely...
You're right. I can turn it all off when I'm doing my job, but I still want to be treated... tenderly sometimes...
